content: holly bow consists of a bow made with 4 cm \ 1½ inches\ wide decorative ribbon with wire edges two knitted leaves and a bling button **size ** one size **needles ** 3 mm \ us2½\ double-pointed needles **materials ** approx 2 g cashmere by mondial 25 g = 115 m \ 126 yds\ or cashmere classic by cardiff 25 g = 112 m \ 122 yds\ or cashmere premium by lang yarn 25 g = 115 m \ 126 yds\ or pure cashmere by sysleriget 50 g = 224 m \ 245 yds\ 4 cm \ 1½ inches\ wide decorative ribbon with wire edges 1 bling button ø = 20 mm **difficulty ** ★ 1 out of 5 see the classification of difficulty here 1 the white leaf is knitted in cashmere by mondial in the color 938 the green leaf is knitted in pure cashmere by sysleriget in the color dusty green the brown leaf is knitted in cashmere premium by lang yarn in the color 139 the bright green leaf is knitted in pure cashmere by sysleriget in the color emerald green 1 https //www petiteknit com/en/pages/svaerhedsgrad
